column1: General Reporting,,,"below is set of use cases that provides details of the use case and hence provides the process flow for the same### use case:
Voice CDR,System shall ingest Call Detail Records (CDR) data for voice services.; System shall handle errors and store CDRs in the database.,User uploads voice CDR files to the system.
column2: System processes the files, validates, and ingests data into the database.
column3: System logs any errors encountered during processing.","below is set of use cases that provides details of the use case and hence provides the process flow for the same### use case:

column1: System shall ingest Call Detail Records (CDR) data for voice services.
column2: System shall handle errors and store CDRs in the database.

column1: User uploads voice CDR files to the system.
column2: System processes the files, validates, and ingests data into the database.
column3: System logs any errors encountered during processing."

column1: Rejected CDR,System shall generate reports for rejected CDRs.,User accesses the Rejected CDR report section.
column2: User specifies criteria for the report.
column3: System fetches data based on criteria and displays the report.,"below is set of use cases that provides details of the use case and hence provides the process flow for the same### use case:

column1: System shall generate reports for rejected CDRs.

column3: System fetches data based on criteria and displays the report."

column1: Carrier Tarif,System shall manage carrier tariff data.
column2: System shall provide a dashboard for tariff data.,User inputs carrier tariff data.
column3: System stores and processes the tariff data.
column4: System updates the dashboard with the new tariff data.,"below is set of use cases that provides details of the use case and hence provides the process flow for the same### use case:

column2: System compiles data and generates the invoice.
